text: قَالَ هِيَ رَٰوَدَتۡنِي عَن نَّفۡسِيۚ وَشَهِدَ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَآ إِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن قُبُلٖ فَصَدَقَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

translation.en: [Joseph] said, "It was she who sought to seduce me." And a witness from her family testified. "If his shirt is torn from the front, then she has told the truth, and he is of the liars
translation.id: Dia (Yusuf) berkata, "Dia yang menggodaku dan merayu diriku." seorang saksi dari keluarga perempuan itu memberikan kesaksian, "Jika baju gamisnya koyak di bagian depan, maka peerempuan itu benar, dan dia (Yusuf) termasuk orang yang dusta
